dataSubmission.question: What happens when I submit my data?
dataSubmission.answer: When you submit your data, it gets transformed into a structured markdown file. This file is then uploaded to our database for moderation review before being integrated into the system.

sourceManagement.question: How do I add sources to my entries?
sourceManagement.answer: Each field has an option to add sources. Click the 'Add Source' button next to a field to add source information and additional references that support your entry.

fieldNavigation.question: How can I navigate through many fields?
fieldNavigation.answer: Use the Field Navigator on the right side of the screen. It provides a quick overview of all your fields and allows you to jump directly to any section by clicking on it.

imageUpload.question: What should I know about uploading images?
imageUpload.answer: When uploading images, you must provide copyright information for each image. The system accepts common image formats, and you can add multiple images for different views of the building.

addFields.question: How do I add new fields?
addFields.answer: Click the 'Add Fields' button on the left side of the screen to open the property selector. Select the fields you want to add and click 'Add Selected Properties'.

saveChanges.question: How do I save my changes?
saveChanges.answer: Click the green 'Save' button at the bottom of the form. Your data will be saved and you can continue editing or start a new entry.

resetForm.question: Can I reset the form?
resetForm.answer: Yes, you can click the 'Reset All Fields' button at the bottom of the form. This will clear all entered data after confirmation.

richText.question: What are rich text fields?
richText.answer: Rich text fields allow you to enter formatted text with additional details that don't fit into the standard fields. You can add them using the 'Add Rich Text' button.
